      • percentageChange

        public static com.google.common.base.Optional<FormatterUtils.Cell> percentageChange​(double oldAmount,
                                                                                    double newAmount)
        Format new amount associated with change in percentage For example, with oldAmount = 2 and newAmount = 1 the result Cell is " -50.00%" (in red color)
        Parameters:
        oldAmount - old resource usage
        newAmount - new resource usage
        Returns:
        formatted chagne in percentage if oldAmount and newAmount differ
